explanations.unsupervised learning: The paper introduces a novel pruning based Hierarchical Agglomerative Clustering (HAC) algorithm, which is a type of unsupervised learning technique used to discover similarities in financial time series data without labeled outcomes.
explanations.clustering: The core of the research is focused on a clustering algorithm (Hierarchical Agglomerative Clustering) designed to detect outliers in financial time series by grouping similar data points together.
